Posts.Content: BRCA1positive wrote: triple negative grade 3 invasive ducal carcinoma. I want my lumpectomy now!!!!! I had to have a second biopsy on another mass before they do the surgery, the second mass is benign. Sometimes I hate weekends. Waiting for business days to be able to schedule surgery. I want to know if the cancer is in my lymph nodes or not. Also want to start healing so I can start treatment. This waiting is driving me nuts Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Start the treatment already!!!!! BRCA1positive Brimton
